title: Did Pres. Trump Say Kim Jong Un ‘Is Smarter and Would Make a Better President’ Than Joe Biden?
subtitle: The president took verbal potshots at his potential 2020 Democratic rival during a May 2019 state visit to Japan.
author: David Emery
vclaim: U.S. President Donald Trump said: "Kim Jong Un is smarter and would make a better President than Sleepy Joe Biden."
